spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall layout is recognizable (living/dining left, kitchen+utility bottom/center, bedrooms to the right, master suite top), but multiple plan-to-render mismatches: (E4) several room dimensions/proportions do not match the labeled 2D sizes (notably kitchen, master, bed 2/3/4 appear resized/reshaped). (E2/E3) multiple door locations/swing orientations differ from the 2D plan, especially around the bedroom-zone corridor and the cluster of common/powder toilets near dining/bedroom 4. (E2) balcony sizing/labeling is inconsistent with the plan (2D indicates different balcony widths for living vs master; 3D shows both as the same). (E2/E1) window distribution does not match the 2D plan’s implied openings—several exterior walls that should have openings appear blank while large windows are emphasized on some facades without clear correspondence.

structural_fidelity.notes: Primary room adjacencies are mostly preserved (kitchen next to utility, bedrooms grouped right, master with dress+toilets), but fidelity issues remain: (E4) wall runs and room outlines are simplified/shifted, impacting corridor definition and toilet block geometry. (E2/E3) door embedding and swing directions are not consistently aligned with the 2D plan, especially for small toilets. (E2) some exterior opening placements (windows/doors to balconies) do not consistently reflect the 2D layout. No clearly new/extra rooms are introduced, but the reconfiguration of service/toilet partitions reads as a partial plan rewrite rather than a faithful extrusion.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture intent generally matches room function (sofas in living, dining table centered, beds in bedrooms), but (E4) scaling is inconsistent with the 2D dimensions (some rooms appear too large/small relative to furniture), and (E2) several furniture placements do not reflect the 2D furniture/layout cues (e.g., living seating group proportions and placement relative to balcony edge differ).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean, visually pleasing isometric-style render with good lighting and readable room zoning. Minor issues: (E6) slight perspective/foreshortening reduces orthographic accuracy, and some geometry feels simplified (especially tight toilet/corridor areas). Overall composition and clarity are strong.

detected_errors.description: Room proportions/dimensions in 3D do not match the 2D labeled sizes (kitchen and multiple bedrooms appear resized/reshaped).
Balcony sizing/labeling differs: 2D indicates different balcony widths (living vs master), while 3D depicts/labels them as the same.
Door positions around the bedroom corridor and toilet cluster differ from the 2D plan (openings appear shifted).
Several door swing orientations in 3D do not match the 2D plan, especially for small toilets.

Window placement/quantity on exterior walls does not consistently correspond to the 2D plan; some walls show large windows where the plan does not clearly indicate them, while other expected openings appear missing.
Render uses slight perspective rather than strict orthographic/isometric projection, reducing measurement fidelity.
